comments.body: I am not sure if the documentation should describe the format used after of before call to [`_return_formatted`](https://github.com/pilou-/ansible/blob/fcdcd5931953ce42e9009264a7fa2372af28bb7b/lib/ansible/module_utils/basic.py#L1938) ?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +87,91 @@deprecations
````````````
This key contains a list of dictionaries that will be presented to the user. Keys of the dictionaries are `msg` and `version`, values are string, value for the `version` key can be an empty string.
